title: WEEKLY CRYPTO PRICE ANALYSIS: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, AND SOL
description: Weekly crypto price analysis shows that most of the coins have been trading close to their upper resistance levels, which indicates the possibility of a bullish breakout. Bitcoin has been ranging above $29,00 for the past few days and is currently trading near the higher end of its range. Most coins have been showing a ... Read more

title: China doubles down on cryptocurrency crackdown: Central bank Governor reiterates stance
description: China’s newly appointed central bank Governor Pan Gongsheng has clarified his stance on maintaining financial stability in the country. The governor said he would halt the speculation of crypto transactions and crack down on illegal fund-raising and money laundering.  Stricter oversight on financial licensing According to a  local media outlet report, the governor emphasized the ... title: Jameson Lopp doubts Hal Finney, Satoshi Nakamoto connection
description: According to Lopp, it would have been impossible for Hal Finney to initiate a Bitcoin transaction while focused on a race in Santa Barbara, California.

title: Upland blockchain gaming project raises $7m ahead of ERC-20 token launch
description: The fresh capital injection is earmarked for expanding the Upland game in several significant ways. Most importantly, the funds will be used to improve the game, making it more captivating for players.

title: BlackRock ETF could push BTC valuation 11x, Scaramucci says
description: Scaramucci, the politically connected entrepreneur — who is also the founder and chairman of SALT — argues that a BlackRock greenlight could cause a massive $100 billion in institutional investments.
